Cfg.TextShadows: |0|default background|1|bold|2|bold with ghost|3|bold with background|4|bold with light background|5|ghost|6|ghost with bold|7|dark background|8|background with bold|9|light background

Actions.OnCtrlClickCell: ChooseCellInsert OR DeselectCell OR SelectCell OR DeselectRow OR SelectRow,1
Actions.OnShiftClickCell: ChooseCellReplaceAll OR FocusCellRange OR InvertCellRangeFirst OR InvertRowRangeFirst,1
Actions.OnClickButtonLeft: AlignLeftSelectedF OR NoAlignSelectedF OR AlignLeftCellsF OR NoAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonCenter: AlignCenterSelected OR NoAlignSelected OR AlignCenterCellsF OR NoAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonRight: AlignRightSelectedF OR NoAlignSelectedF OR AlignRightCellsF OR NoAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonTop: VAlignTopSelectedF OR NoVAlignSelectedF OR VAlignTopCellsF OR NoVAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonMiddle: VAlignMiddleSelectedF OR NoVAlignSelectedF OR VAlignMiddleCellsF OR NoVAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonBottom: VAlignBottomSelectedF OR NoVAlignSelectedF OR VAlignBottomCellsF OR NoVAlignCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonBold: BoldOffSelectedF OR BoldOnSelectedF OR BoldOffCellsF OR BoldOnCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonItalic: ItalicOffSelectedF OR ItalicOnSelectedF OR ItalicOffCellsF OR ItalicOnCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonUnderline: UnderlineOffSelectedF OR UnderlineOnSelectedF OR UnderlineOffCellsF OR UnderlineOnCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonStrike: StrikeOffSelectedF OR StrikeOnSelectedF OR StrikeOffCellsF OR StrikeOnCellsF
Actions.OnClickButtonRotateLeft: RotateLeftSelectedF OR NoRotateSelectedF OR RotateLeftF OR NoRotateF
Actions.OnClickButtonRotateRight: RotateRightSelectedF OR NoRotateSelectedF OR RotateRightF OR NoRotateF
Actions.OnClickButtonWrapText: WrapOffSelectedF OR WrapOnSelectedF OR WrapOffCellsF OR WrapOnCellsF
Actions.OnClickPanelColSelect: DeselectCol OR SelectCol OR DeselectColCells OR SelectColCells
Actions.OnDragRow: ChooseCellsReplaceAll OR FocusCells OR DragSelected OR DragRow OR InvertCellsFirst OR InvertRowsFirst
Actions.OnCtrlDragRow: ChooseCellsInsert OR InvertCellsFirst OR DragSelectedCopy OR DragCopy OR InvertRowsFirst
Actions.OnDragGantt: ResizeGanttMain OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttMainFirst OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttFlag OR MoveGanttPoint OR MoveGanttConstraint OR MoveGanttLine OR CreateGanttBar OR DragGanttDependency OR 1
Actions.OnRightDragGantt: SelectGanttRunRect OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttMain OR 1
Actions.OnCtrlClickGantt: DeleteGanttConstraint OR DeleteGanttFlag OR DeleteGanttPoint OR DeleteGanttMain OR DeleteGanttRun OR DeleteGanttRunContainerOnly OR DeleteGanttDependency OR DeleteGanttBase OR DeleteGanttFinish OR 1
Actions.OnDblClickGantt: SelectGanttRun OR EditGanttFlag OR EditGanttResource OR EditGanttText OR EditGanttRun OR EditGanttRunTip OR EditGanttDependencyLag OR NewGanttMilestone OR NewGanttFlag OR NewGanttPoint
Actions.OnDrag1Row: ChooseCellsReplaceAll OR FocusCells OR DragSelected OR DragRow
Actions.OnDrag1Gantt: ResizeGanttMain OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttMainFirst OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttFlag OR MoveGanttPoint OR MoveGanttConstraint OR MoveGanttLine OR CreateGanttBar OR DragGanttDependency
Actions.OnEnter: ChangeBoolF OR ChangeRadioRightCycleF OR StartEdit OR ShowLinkF OR ShowDefaultsF OR ShowFileF OR ShowCalendarF OR EditGanttResourceF
Actions.OnCtrlDown: ShowDefaultsF OR ShowFileF OR ShowFilterMenuF OR ShowCalendarF OR ButtonClickF

Toolbar.BoldOnEnter: BoldOffSelectedF OR BoldOnSelectedF OR BoldOffCellsF OR BoldOnCellsF
Toolbar.ItalicOnEnter: ItalicOffSelectedF OR ItalicOnSelectedF OR ItalicOffCellsF OR ItalicOnCellsF
Toolbar.UnderlineOnEnter: UnderlineOffSelectedF OR UnderlineOnSelectedF OR UnderlineOffCellsF OR UnderlineOnCellsF
Toolbar.StrikeOnEnter: StrikeOffSelectedF OR StrikeOnSelectedF OR StrikeOffCellsF OR StrikeOnCellsF
Toolbar.RotateLeftOnEnter: RotateLeftSelectedF OR NoRotateSelectedF OR RotateLeftF OR NoRotateF
Toolbar.RotateRightOnEnter: RotateRightSelectedF OR NoRotateSelectedF OR RotateRightF OR NoRotateF
Toolbar.WrapTextOnEnter: WrapOffSelectedF OR WrapOnSelectedF OR WrapOffCellsF OR WrapOnCellsF
Toolbar.ColorTextOnClickPopup: ChooseTextColorSelectedF OR ChooseTextColorCellsF OR ChooseTextColorF OR 1
Toolbar.ColorShadowOnClickPopup: ChooseTextShadowColorSelectedF OR ChooseTextShadowColorCellsF OR ChooseTextShadowColorF OR 1
Toolbar.ColorBackgroundOnClickPopup: ChooseColorSelectedF OR ChooseColorCellsF OR ChooseColorF OR 1
Toolbar.BorderOnClickPopup: ChooseSelectedBordersF OR ChooseBordersF OR ChooseBorderF OR 1
